name: Build The Wall (malaimo)
description:
Compete to see who can build the highest wall and sabotage your opponent by shooting catapults at them! The player has to be a lot higher up to win.

W A S D or arrow keys -> navigate your character
H -> shoot your catapult
Z, X -> switch between resources
SPACE -> build your wall!

Group name: no ideas
Group members:
